Name: Cult of the Mask
About the game: Incomprehensible guys decided to organize a cult dedicated to an incomprehensible mask, you need to stop this business! Will you? Incomprehensible guys decided to organize a cult dedicated to an incomprehensible mask, you need to stop this business! Cult of the Mask is a 2D hardcore nice looking pixel shooter game with platformer elements In the game you will: Fight with a crowd of cultists, Find new weapons, Pass through obstacles, Die by spikes, Die from enemies, Kill the mighty mask.
